Subject: JOY RIDE
From: Robert Dahl <rdahl@...>

On the silent beach of Atlanta the waves beat against the shore. Slowly
though a horn can be heard honking in behind the forest. The trees splinter
away as the massive truck form of Motormaster bursts through them. Seeing
the water coming up he slides to a stop on the beach, then transforms.
"Energy anomoly detected" exclaimed his computer as he looked out onto the
ocean. It was perticularily windy and the waves lapt around him, then with
a determined look on his face he slowly lifts off the ground and turns
himself forward, becoming airborn and starts to head off the continent.
